page.t: The Gage-class Transport is a refitted variant of the Terminus, used as a cargo transport. Its heavier armaments were forfeited for more cargo space, but it still boasts an adequite array of weaponry to defend itself.

The origin of this so called "Sith Empire" is unclear.
Some suggest they might be remnants of the old Sith Empire from the times of the Old Republic, waiting until now to make a comeback, while others suggest some of Sheev Palpatine's most fanatical followers formed this new organization, following the ways of the Sith.

What is clear however, is that they are extermely dangerous, and will attack anyone on sight, including Imperial Remnants.
An experimental facility, that uses Rhydonium Cells to produce Module PreFabs, these modules are only available from the Sith Empire.
Origin-, and primary space of Sith-aligned forces, it is advised to keep away from these sectors, as Sith forces will shoot anyone not part of their organization.
